evidence.claim: LifeWallet utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure to support scalability and data security.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations to ensure patient data protection in health-tech applications.
LifeWallet integrates with EHR systems to facilitate patient data exchange in compliance with HL7 standards.
LifeWallet supports X12 transaction sets for electronic claims processing in its recovery platform.
The platform leverages Azure services for data storage and analytics, enhancing its operational capabilities.

icp.icp_reason: LifeWallet processes healthcare transactions, indicating use of X12 and EDI.
